critique: The document is a waiver of subsections (a) and (b) of section 402 of the Trade Act of 1974 with respect to the German Democratic Republic. The tone is formal and legalistic. There is no explicit mention of emotions. The primary goal is to enact a policy change. The language is neutral and objective. There is not enough information to determine the emotions the President wants to elicit, so I will assign a score of 1 to each emotion initially.
